name: Matrix Factorization
title: Matrix Factorization and Neighbor Based Algorithms for the Netflix Prize Problem
author: Gabor Takacs et al
publisher: Proceedings of the 2008 ACM conference on Recommender systems

parameter.name: step_size
parameter.description: The step size for the gradient descent.

parameter.name: reg_factor
parameter.description: The regularization factor used when computing the gradient.

parameter.name: epsilon
parameter.description: The minimal double value which is considered a valid rating.

parameter.name: r
parameter.description: The seed for the random number generator used internally.

parameter.name: n_max
parameter.descripton: The maximal number of iterations of gradient descent is n_max times the number of instances in the dataset.
